pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inference and Clustering of Functional Data // Some methods for the inference and clustering of univariate and multivariate functional data, using a generalization of Mahalanobis distance, along with some functions useful for the analysis of functional data. For further details, see Martino A., Ghiglietti, A., Ieva, F. and Paganoni A. M. (2017) arXiv:1708.00386.
